articles.title: 14 deaths, 3174 new Covid-19 cases in Singapore - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Fourteen people between the ages of 60 and 93 have died of complications linked to Covid-19, the Ministry of Health (MOH) said on Monday (Oct 25).

articles.title: Football: S'pore held to 2-2 draw by 10-man Timor-Leste at U-23 Asian Cup qualifiers - The Straits Times
articles.description: Timor-Leste forward Gali was sent off in the 42th minute but Young Lions failed to capitalise.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
